simple_quarto_website

This is a Quarto website.

To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

This is Head 2 and below are tables and Mermaid Diagram

  • here’s a mermaid diagram
flowchart LR
  A[1.0] --> B(2.0)
  B --> C{3.0}
  C --> D[4.1]
  C --> E[4.2]

A Mermaid diagram

References

Kang, Yue, Zhao Cai, Chee-Wee Tan, Qian Huang, and Hefu Liu. 2020. “Natural Language Processing (NLP) in Management Research: A Literature Review.” Journal of Management Analytics 7 (2): 139–72.

Footnotes

  1. Here is the footnote.↩︎

  2. Here’s one with multiple blocks.

    Subsequent paragraphs are indented to show that they belong to the previous footnote.

    The whole paragraph can be indented, or just the first line. In this way, multi-paragraph footnotes work like multi-paragraph list items.↩︎
